file_content.text: Well. It's certainly no Dromund Kaas.
Corporal Gibbons reorganized the stock room up to Imperial standards. Seems I misjudged the man.
It was a rocky start, but the base now runs like a well-oiled machine. Impressive.
How am I supposed to work when none of the equipment has been properly codified? It's atrocious.
Grand Moff Kilran would never have stood for such unprofessionalism.
Another batch of recruits arrived today. Their enthusiasm is nauseating.
Last night's meal was almost decent. Some kind of roast bird.
The air here is quite lovely. Much better than the humidity on Dromund Kaas.
The Imperial military could learn a few tricks from us.
